files.patch:
@@ -421,3 +421,3 @@
-// This typedef is to address the issue of running a 32-bit VM on a 64-bit platform. In this case
-// the amount of physical memory may not fit in size_t, so we have to have a larger type. Once 32-bit
-// is depricated, one can use size_t.
+// This typedef is to address the issue of running a 32-bit VM. In this case the amount
+// of physical memory may not fit in size_t, so we have to have a larger type. Once 32-bit
+// is deprecated, one can use size_t.
